scripts.postinstall: cd frontend && bun install --save-text-lockfile && cd ../backend && bun install && cd ../docs/site && bun install
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run docs"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && cd backend && bun run generate:frontend-imports && cd .. && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && bun run clean && bun run build
scripts.build:prod: cd frontend && bun run clean && bun run build && bun run compress-wasm && cd ../backend && bun run generate:frontend-imports && bun run build
scripts.build:preview: cd frontend && bun run clean && bun run ng build --configuration=preview && bun run compress-wasm && cd ../backend && bun run generate:frontend-imports && bun run build
scripts.build:cloudflare: cd frontend && bun run clean && bun run ng build --configuration=cloudflare && bun run compress-wasm && cd ../backend && bun run generate:frontend-imports && bun run build
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:frontend && cd backend && bun run test:coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend && npm run format:docs
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:frontend && npm run typecheck:backend
scripts.verify:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint && npm test && npm run e2e:ci
scripts.verify:backend: cd backend && bun run lint && bun test
scripts.docs:gen-api: cd docs/site && bun run clean-api-docs && bun run gen-api-docs
scripts.docs:update-api: cd backend && bun run generate:openapi && cd ../docs/site && bun run clean-api-docs && bun run gen-api-docs
scripts.generate:all: npm run generate:openapi && npm run generate:client && npm run docs:gen-api
scripts.cloudflare:preview:deploy: npm run build:preview && cd frontend && node ../scripts/cloudflare-deploy.js inkweld-frontend-preview dist/browser && cd ../backend && bun run db:migrate:preview && bun run wrangler deploy --env preview
scripts.cloudflare:preview:logs: cd backend && bun run wrangler tail --env preview
scripts.cloudflare:prod:deploy: npm run build:cloudflare && cd frontend && node ../scripts/cloudflare-deploy.js inkweld-frontend dist/browser && cd ../backend && bun run db:migrate:prod && bun run wrangler deploy --env production
scripts.cloudflare:prod:logs: cd backend && bun run wrangler tail --env production
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:docs
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && bun run clean && rm -rf node_modules/.cache .angular
scripts.clean:docs: cd docs/site && bun run clear && rm -rf build
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules docs/site/node_modules
